txt.en: Adamanda North-took can be found in Nobottle.\n\nYou should look for Adamanda North-took.
With her Grand Plan put on hold, Adamanda North-took has a renewed passion for helping to protect Yondershire.

'A report from the Bounders? Do give it here and let's see what they have found.'

She reads over the report, her brow furrowing.

'This is not good. The report states that strange Men have been seen along the walls that border our lands. We should go and have a look for ourselves and see what is going on. Why, with your help we can cover twice as much ground! Meet me at the wall west of Tighfield.'
Search along the wall for anything amiss
Continue searching along the wall
TBD
Continue along the wall
Diamond is waiting for you by the wall west of Tighfield.\n\nYou should let Diamond know about the Men you defeated.

'I am glad that my daughter is starting to take things more seriously. Perhaps I have your influence to thank for that, along with my words to her earlier, of course.\n\n'Since I am assuming you are out doing her work for her and will see her again soon, I bid you take this report to her. It came to me by way of our local Bounders, and its contents trouble me. Please ask my daughter to look into the situation.'
Patrolling the Yondershire Wall
The wall is located west of Tighfield, in Yondershire.\n\nDiamond has asked you to meet her by the wall west of Tighfield.
Defeat demolishing ruffian ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The wall is located west of Tighfield.\n\nDiamond has asked you to help her patrol the wall for anything suspicious.
Defeat demolishing thief ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Nothing amiss here
The wall is located west of Tighfield.\n\nYou should continue patrolling the wall.
Stones from the wall lie here
The wall is located west of Tighfield.\n\nYou should continue patrolling the wall.
Meet Diamond by the wall
The wall is located west of Tighfield.\n\nYou should defeat brigands who are attempting to breach and destroy the wall.
Talk to Adamanda
Brigands are destroying the wall!
Bring the report to Diamond
Defeated demolishing ruffian ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated demolishing thief ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'You head that way and I'll head this way. Let us meet back here once we have scouted the wall.'
Adamanda reads the report

'Welcome back! How did you do?'

You tell her about the bandits.

'What! I should have picked that way instead. All I found was a suspicious lump of cloth. Turned out to be the old farmer's cloak. He was happy to have it back, at least.

'Well, my friend. We have done many a brave thing together today! Thank you for all of your help, and especially for helping me refocus my efforts for Yondershire. I will not be Reeve for some time, but all of today's wandering around showed me how much help I can be to townsfolk. Perhaps one day I will wander outside of the wall and along the dusty roads, but for now, there is plenty for me to do here.

'Thank you again, my friend!'
